Detailed Description

Author: Jaakko Luttinen BodyPlanet is a class for planets. Planets are non-moving, rotating circle-shaped bodies with mass. There are three different sizes and four different looks. Planet has also "End of round" -procedures: it rotates a bit.

void BodyPlanet::destroy (   )  [virtual]
 

Raises the flag to show that the planet is destroyed and should be removed from the world. Will also destroy all the cannons on its surface.

Reimplemented from Body.

void BodyPlanet::draw (  Graphics &  graphics  )  [virtual]
 

Does drawing procedures.

Parameters:
graphics The graphics object to draw to.

Reimplemented from Body.

virtual void BodyPlanet::endOfRound (  float  step  )  [inline, virtual]
 

At the end of round, planet will rotate a bit. This function may be called many times to create a fluent rotation. Step will determine the relative rotation (0-1).

Parameters:
step Relative step length (0-1). The sum is eventually 1.

Reimplemented from Body.

Tells the angle of the planet's axis.

The angle of the planet's axis.

void BodyPlanet::rotate (  float  angle  )
